ygData.subject: Re: [archive-crawler] DAT files and Heritrix
ygData.msgSnippet: hello Tadas, the crawl.log file provides detailed information about each URL encountered during crawling. a summary of ARC file contents can be produced in CDX

hello Tadas,

the crawl.log file provides detailed information about
each URL encountered during crawling. a summary of ARC
file contents can be produced in CDX format with the
ARCReader class. there is also a bin/arcreader shell
script provided in the distribution.


/steve@...


On 4/27/10 4:03 AM, tadas.blinda75 wrote:
>
>
> Hi,
>
> Internet archive has a dedicated format to contain meta-data about the
> documents stored in ARC files (called DAT files) [1]. Most importantly,
> it contains the URLs Heritrix found during the crawl of the pages. How
> can I create such DAT files in Heritrix (or generate them from ARC or
> WARC files?)
>
> Thanks!
> Tadas Blinda
>
> References:
> [1] http://www.archive.org/web/researcher/dat_file_format.php
> <http://www.archive.org/web/researcher/dat_file_format.php>
>
> 

-- 
/steve@...
